price: 91 ou que tu posséderas une palmeraie et un vignoble traversés de rivières vives,
arabic: أَوۡ تَكُونَ لَكَ جَنَّةٞ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَعِنَبٖ فَتُفَجِّرَ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرَ خِلَٰلَهَا تَفۡجِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: aw takūna laka jannatun min nakhīlin waʿinabin fatufajjira al-anhāra khilālahā tafjīran
